I don't know why but I have a vivid memory of markiplier making (or at least starring in)  a game where you are on a ship and you can explore around free roam style.. you're supposed to stick around and watch cut scenes and help out the crew to stop various problems with the ship as well as try to save the ship from going into a sun. However if you backtrack at some points or avoid listening to all the cutscenes, things happen where mark can try to follow you and get you back on the mission. But what you learn is mark is actually an alien (in an among us style scenario but he's more like... alien from the movie in species type) and he's been killing off people you left alone. and you're ultimately trying to 'escape' without being caught by mark or his alien counterpart.
